column5: weve been out of b-ville a couple of times and are getting SQUAT shakers and the odd bow and weve tried everything anybody wanna give a nudge into something to try? pm or whatever it sucks spending all that money on gas for the boat lol
Been having success with Spin Doctors in green and silver. Otherwise RAC spoons in silver w/green tape or silver w/blue tape.
yea i heard silver and green is hot right now..  i was hoping to maybe get out for some rainbows this saturday..  i was going to rip and flat line

Buddy of mine was out from Etobicoke on the weekend. White Spin Doctor/Green fly or black/green, silver/green spoons all produced. 35-60 down in 120-160. 6 fish/5hrs. 5-15lbs. Nuttin huge but still a good morning.

A buddy of mine has been doing good in the evenings on the flies.....white was good last time I talked to him, but its different every time it seems.  He's heading out to 120FOW and trolling east-west from 30-60ft down.  Sinker
